      • get

        public static PlayerState get(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Method used to get the PlayerState of the specified player. Creates a new instance of a PlayerState if none is found.
        Parameters:
        The - Player you want to get the PlayerState for.
        Returns:
        The PlayerState of that player.

        Parameters:
        The - Player to remove from the list.

        Returns if a player is in BypassMode.
        Returns:

      • toggleBypassMode

        public boolean toggleBypassMode()
        Toggles Bypass Mode.
        Returns:
        Returns the new value.

      • checkResetMode

        public void checkResetMode()
        Prepares a scheduled task to reset the mode after a configured amount of time. If a task is already scheduled it is canceled first.

      • getReinforcementType

        public ReinforcementType getReinforcementType()
        Returns the ReinforcementType for a PlayerState.

        ReinforcementType.
